TEXT.English: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Warning:[COLOR_REVERT] This game is not valid for HOF or GOTM use.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Attention :[COLOR_REVERT] Ce Mod est invalide pour une partie de type HOF ou GOTM.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Warnung:[COLOR_REVERT] Diese Partie ist nicht zulässig zur Verwendung mit HOF oder GOTM.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Attenzione:[COLOR_REVERT] questa partita non è valida per l'uso con HOF o GOTM.
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Advertencia:[COLOR_REVERT] Esta partida no es válida para su uso con HOF o GOTM.
TEXT.Finnish: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Warning:[COLOR_REVERT] This game is not valid for HOF or GOTM use.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]HOF Warning:[COLOR_REVERT] This game is not valid for HOF use. See the Settings page of the Victory screen for details.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Avertissement HOF:[COLOR_REVERT] Cette partie est invalide pour figurer dans le HOF. Pour plus de détails, consultez l'onglet Propriétés de l'écran de Victoire
TEXT.German: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]HOF-Warnung:[COLOR_REVERT] Diese Partie ist nicht zulässig zur Verwendung mit HOF. Beachten Sie die Seite "Einstellungen" im Sieg-Bildschirm.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Avviso HOF:[COLOR_REVERT] questa partita non è valida per l'uso con HOF. Per maggiori dettagli, guarda la pagina delle Impostazioni nella Schermata di Vittoria.
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]HOF Advertencia:[COLOR_REVERT] Esta partida no es válida para su uso con HOF. Consulta la pestaña de Configuración en la pantalla de Victoria para conocer los detalles.
TEXT.Finnish: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]HOF Warning:[COLOR_REVERT] This game is not valid for HOF use. See the Settings page of the Victory screen for details.

TEXT.English: This game is not valid for HOF use. See the [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]highlighted[COLOR_REVERT] in the boxes below for the specific invalid settings.
TEXT.French: Cette Partie est invalide pour figurer dans le HOF. Consulter le [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Texte mis en évidence[COLOR_REVERT] dans les champs suivants pour connaître les paramètres invalidants.
TEXT.German: Diese Partie ist nicht zulässig zur Verwendung mit HOF. Beachten Sie die [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]hervorgehobenen[COLOR_REVERT] Einstellungen in den Feldern unten, um diese entsprechend zu ändern.
TEXT.Italian: Questa partita non è valida per l'uso con HOF. Vedi la parte [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]evidenziata[COLOR_REVERT] nelle caselle sottostanti per le specifiche impostazioni non valide.
TEXT.Spanish: Esta partida no es válida para su uso con HOF. Consulta las partes [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]resaltadas[COLOR_REVERT] in las opciones de más abajo para ver la configuración incorrecta.
TEXT.Finnish: This game is not valid for HOF use. See the [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]highlighted[COLOR_REVERT] in the boxes below for the specific invalid settings.

TEXT.Italian: Avviso HOF
TEXT.Spanish: HOF Advertencia

TEXT.French: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Les joueurs sur Mac ne peuvent pas soumettre leurs résultats HOF[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Mac Players cannot submit HoF Entries[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Jugadores con Mac no pueden enviar entradas al HoF [COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Il gioco di squadra non è consentito[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Juego en equipos no permitido[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]%s1 è stato scelto %d2 volte[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]%s1 ha sido elegido %d2 veces[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]%d1 or more opponents are required for a %s2[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.French: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]%d1 adversaires ou plus sont nécessaires pour un %s2[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.German: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]%d1 oder mehr Gegner sind erforderlich für ein %s2[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Sono necessari %d1 o più avversari per un %s2[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]%d1 o más oponentes son necesarios para un %s2[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Finnish: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]%d1 or more opponents are required for a %s2[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]%d1 or less opponents are required for a %s2[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.French: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]%d1 adversaires au maximum sont nécessaire pour un %s2[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.German: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]%d1 oder weniger Gegner sind erforderlich für ein %s2[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Sono necessari %d1 o meno avversari per un %s2[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]%d1 o menos oponentes son necesarios para un %s2[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Finnish: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]%d1 or less opponents are required for a %s2[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]BUFFY deve essere installato in:[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]BUFFY debe instalarse en:[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Le partite in multi-player non sono consentite[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]partidas Multijugador no permitidas[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]The BUFFY DLL is missing.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]La DLL de BUFFY no se encuentra.[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Checksum saltato.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Ignorado Checksum.[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]CRCs are missing. This game can't be used. Check Locked Modified Assets if unchecked.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.French: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]CRCs manquants. Ce jeu n'est pas valide. Vérifiez si l'option 'Assets modifiés verrouillés' est désactivée.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.German: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]CRC-Werte fehlen. Diese Partie kann nicht verwendet werden. Aktivieren Sie "Locked Modified Assets", falls diese Option deaktiviert ist.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Mancano i CRC. Questa partita non può essere usata. Seleziona 'Locked Modified Assets' (se non lo è già).[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]No se encuentra CRCs. Esta partida no puede ser utilizada. Comprueba si Bloquear Parámetros Modificados (Locked Modified Assets) esta desmarcado.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Finnish: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]CRCs are missing. This game can't be used. Check Locked Modified Assets if unchecked.[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]The assets are different from a standard install. Contact the HOF staff.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.French: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Les Données (assets) sont différentes d'une installation standard. Contacter l'équipe de HOF.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.German: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Die Dateien unterscheiden sich von einer Standard-Installation. Kontaktieren Sie das HOF-Team.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]'Assets' differenti da quelli di una partita standard; contatta lo Staff HOF.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Los ajustes son distintos a los de una instalación estándar. Contacta con elHOF staff.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Finnish: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]The assets are different from a standard install. Contact the HOF staff.[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Controllo dei CRC fallito.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Fallo al comprobar CRCs.[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]All Victory Conditions must be enabled. The following are missing:[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.French: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Toutes les Conditions de Victoire doivent être activées. Les conditions suivantes sont désactivées :[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.German: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Alle Siegbedingungen müssen aktiviert sein. Die folgenden sind deaktiviert:[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Tutte le Condizioni di Vittoria devono essere abilitate; mancano le seguenti:[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Todas las Condiciones de Victoria deben estar activadas. Las siguientes faltan:[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Finnish: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]All Victory Conditions must be enabled. The following are missing:[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](Required)[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](Requerido)[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](non consentito)[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](No permitido)[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Il bilanciamento delle Risorse non è consentito[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Recursos equilibrados no permitidos[COLOR_REVERT]
